lines.text: Let's see... what do we know about the hole in Slick?
Well, it's in the chest, it's consistent with a gunshot wound...
But it's cooked shut, so we can't get in there until Opal gets her tools ready.
Right, Whydah? That's the convenient story?
It's- just, um... give me some time.
Hm... I don't think looking at the hole will really help.
It's probably... something magic that happened to that <c=#FF00FF>bullet.</c>
